text: so on january 1st
1987 i'd quit my job to go look for a
business to buy
there was no turning back i had moved
forward to find an entrepreneurial
business and spent
10 months and 21 days in that process
and it was great it took about three or
four years
before that for me to come to the
conclusion that i'd gotten pretty good
at running businesses for other people
and i wanted to do it on my own and i
wanted the autonomy and the independence
to be able to go off
and be my own entrepreneur instead of
working for someone else
one of the first things that that i did
when i owned my business was i hired my
wife who was a harvard mba
to be my cfo we had just had our first
child
when i bought the business so raising a
family working with your spouse
thinking through the issues of of your
future
and choices around family life balance
are pretty important to me
and resonate with many students who have
to think about these things as they
think about their careers
i work with a lot of students who are
interested in the search field
and i was an early searcher and bring a
lot to that
that discussion i also want to make sure
when i talk to students that
i leave them with something so when they
leave my office i want them to have
someone else they can reach out to to
speak with or someone else that i've
worked with in the past that would be
willing to talk to them
